tuv.seg: The Blind Pension is a means-tested payment paid to blind and visually impaired people who are habitually resident in Ireland
Íocaíocht le scrúdú maoine é Pinsean Daill a íoctar leis na daill agus le daoine atá faoi mhíchumas na súl a bhfuil gnáthchónaí in Éirinn orthu
The payment is made by the Department of Social Protection
An Roinn Coimirce Sóisialaí a dhéanann an íocaíocht
To qualify for the Pension you must supply an eye test from an opthalmic surgeon to verify your visual impairment
Le bheith i dteideal an phinsin ní mór scrúdú súl a fháil déanta ag lia oftailmeach (íocfaidh an Roinn as) ar mhaithe le míchumas na súl a chinntiú
The payment is made up of a personal rate for you and extra amounts for a qualified adult and any child dependants (see 'Rates' below)
Tá an íocaíocht a gheobhaidh tú déanta suas de ráta pearsanta duit féin agus suimeanna eile do dhuine fásta cáilithe agus aon pháistí cleithiúnacha (breathnaigh na rátaí thíos)
If you are awarded a Blind Pension, you may also qualify for the Blind Welfare Allowance paid by the HSE
Má fhaigheann tú Pinsean Daill d’fhéadfadh sé go mbeadh tú in ann Liúntas Leasa na nDall a fháil freisin
You will automatically get a Free Travel Pass and a Companion Free Travel Pass
Gheobhaidh tú Pas Saor Thaistil agus Pas Saor Thaistil Chompánaigh
(A Free Travel Pass allows you to travel on State public transport in Ireland for free
(Pas Saor Thaistil a thugann deis duit taisteal ar sheirbhísí iompair phoiblí an Stáit saor in aisce
A Companion Free Travel Pass allows your companion aged 16 or over to also travel for free)
Tugann Pas Saor Thaistil Chompánaigh deis do chompánach atá 16 bliana nó ós a chionn taisteal in éineacht leat in aisce)
You may also qualify for other benefits such as the Living Alone Increase and the Household Benefits Package
D'fhéadfadh sé freisin go mbeadh tú i dteideal liúntas eile, Liúntas Cónaithe i d'Aonair agus an Scéim Liúntas don Líon Tí
This provision is in effect from April 2015
É Pinsean na nDall foinse inchánach ioncaim
If you are blind or have a serious visual impairment before reaching 18 years, you should make your claim 4 months before your 18th birthday
Más duine dall thú nó má tá tú faoi mhíchumas dona amhairc roimh duit ocht mbliana déag a bhaint amach ba cheart duit éileamh a dhéanamh ar an bPinsean seo 4 mhí roimh d'ochtú breithlá déag
(If you are aged 16-18, you may qualify for Disability Allowance.) Blind Pension is not paid after you turn 66
(Má tá tú idir 16-18, d'fhéadfadh sé go mbeadh tú in ann Liúntas Míchumais) a fháil.) Féadfaidh tú Pinsean na nDall a fháil go dtí go sroichfidh tú 66 bliana d’aois
If you become blind or seriously visually impaired after your 18th birthday, you should apply as soon as possible
Más i ndiaidh duit ocht mbliana déag a bhaint amach a thagann daille nó míchumas amhairc ort, ba cheart duit iarratas a dhéanamh chomh luath agus a tharlaíonn sé
This is important as payment can only be made from the date your application is received
Tá sé seo tábhachtach mar ní féidir íocaíocht a thabhairt ach ón lá a thagann an t-iarratas isteach
If you require full-time care, the person looking after you may qualify for a Carer's Allowance or Carer's Benefit
Má theastaíonn cúram lánaimseartha uait d'fhéadfadh sé go mbeadh an cúramaí i dteideal ceann de na híocaíochtaí seo a leanas - Liúntas Cúramaí nó Sochar Cúramaí
The main items that are counted as means include:
I measc na bpríomhnithe a chuirtear san áireamh mar mhaoin tá:
• Any cash income that you or your spouse, civil partner or cohabitant may have (including income from employment)
• Aon ioncam airgid thirim atá agat nó ag do chéile/pháirtnéir sibhialta/chomhchónaitheoir
• The value of savings, investments, shares, land etc
• Luach aon choigiltis, infheistíochtaí, scaireanna, talún, & rl
• Any property you may have
• Aon áitreabh atá agat
• Maintenance paid to you if you are deserted, separated or a civil partner not living with the other civil partner
• Íocaíocht chothabhála a fhaigheann tú má tá tú tréigthe, scartha nó páirtnéir sibhialta nach bhfuil ina c(h)ónaí leis an bpáirtnéir sibhialta eile
The following items are not counted as means for Blind Pension:
Ní chuirtear na nithe seo san áireamh mar mhaoin:
• Any payment made by the Department of Social Protection
• Íocaíocht ón Roinn seo atá dhá fháil ag ball eile den líon tí
• The value of the first €20,000 of capital assets (for example, savings)
• Luach an chéad €20,000 de shócmhainní caipitiúla (mar shampla coigiltis)
• Money received from a recognised charitable organisation (excluding public or local authority)
• Airgead a fuair tú ó eagraíocht aitheanta carthanachta (gan údarás poiblí nó áitiúil a bheith san áireamh)
• The maintenance part of a student grant from SUSI paid to you, a qualified adult or child dependant(s) for certain courses
• An chuid chothabhála de dheontas ard aoideachais a íoctar ar do shon, ar son duine fhásta cháilithe nó ar son leanaí cleithiúnacha i leith cúrsaí faoi leith
• Income up to a certain limit from rehabilitative employment
• Ioncam go huasteorainn faoi leith ón bhfostaíocht athshlánaithe
• Income from rehabilitative training
• Ioncam ó thraenáil athshlánaithe
• Child Benefit, Supplementary Welfare Allowance or foster care allowances
• Sochar Leanaí, Liúntas Breise Leasa ná liúntais i dtaobh leanaí atá faoi chúram altrama nó gaolta
• Mobility Allowance from the Department of Health
• Liúntas Soghluaisteachta ón Roinn Sláinte
Work and Blind Pension
• Liúntas Leasa na nDall
• €400 of your annual earnings
Obair agus Pinsean Daill

• €133 of your annual earnings for each of your qualified children under age 18 (or under age 22 if in full time education). There are no disregards for your spouse, civil partner or cohabitant's earnings. Blind Pension and other payments
Is féidir leat €120 sa tseachtain a shaothrú ón bhfostaíocht athshlánaithe roimh don ioncam sin a bheith curtha san áireamh don scrúdú maoine
• Widow’s, Widower’s or Surviving Civil Partner’s Contributory and Non-Contributory Pension
Má bhíonn tú i bhfostaíocht athshlánaithe le tuarastal idir €120 agus €350 in aghaidh na seachtaine
If an increase is payable for a qualified spouse, civil partner or cohabitant and/or qualified children with your Blind Pension, an increase is also payable on the schemes listed above
Má tá do thuillimh ó obair athshlánaithe os cionn €120 sa tseachtain, ní thógfar 50% ded' thuillimh idir €120 agus €350 san áireamh sa tástáil acmhainne don Pinsean na nDall

Blind Pension is payable while you are getting Partial Capacity Benefit. Partial Capacity Benefit is not taken into account in the means test for Blind Pension but your earnings are taken into account and may affect the amount of Blind Pension paid
Má tá Pinsean na nDall agat measúnófar aon thuillimh os cionn €350 agus laghdófar do theidlíocht do Phinsean na nDall ar aon dul leis na rátaí laghdaithe íocaíochta cuí do Phinsean na nDall

Conas iarratas a dhéanamh
To apply fill in application form (BP1) (pdf)
Is féidir foirm iarratais (BP1) do Phinsean na nDall a íoschóipeáil anseo (pdf)
A braille and audio cassette tape version of this application form is also available from the National Council for the Blind of Ireland
Tá leagan i gcló braille agus ar chaiséad fuaime den fhoirm iarratais seo ar fáil freisin ó Chomhairle Náisiúnta do na Daill in Éirinn
This application form is also available from your Intreo Centre or Social Welfare Branch Office
Tá an fhoirm iarratais seo ar fáil freisin ón oifig áitiúil leasa shóisialaigh
Staff in your Intreo Centre or Social Welfare Branch Office will be happy to help you to complete the form and can answer any questions you may have
Beidh cúnamh ar fáil duit ón bhfoireann san oifig áitiúil leasa shóisialaigh leis an bhfoirm seo a chomhlánú agus is féidir leo aon cheisteanna atá agat a fhreagairt
When you apply for Blind Pension you may need to send the Department certificates if the birth(s), marriage, civil partnership or civil union took place outside the Republic of Ireland

Agus iarratas á dhéanamh agat ar Phinsean na nDall, is féidir go gcaithfidh tú teastais mar iad seo a leanas a chur chugainn má tharla an bhreith (na breitheanna), an pósadh, an pháirtnéireacht shibhialta nó an t-aontas sibhialta lasmuigh de Phoblacht na hÉireann
If you are unhappy with a decision made about your claim for Blind Pension, you can appeal against it
Achomharc a dhéanamh maidir le d'éileamh
You must always tell the Department of Social Protection if there are any changes to your circumstances while you are getting a Blind Pension
Má tá tú míshásta le cinneadh a bhaineann le d'éileamh ar Phinsean na nDall is féidir leat achomharc a dhéanamh
If your means or circumstances change you may no longer qualify for the payment or it may be reduced
Léigh tuilleadh maidir le córas achomhairc leasa shóisialaigh anseo
Department of Social Protection
An Roinn Coimirce Sóisialaí
Opening Hours:This office does not offer a service to personal callers
Uaireanta Oscailte:Ní thairgeann an oifig seo seirbhís do chuairteoirí pearsanta
All queries must be made using the online enquiry form, by telephone or in writing
Caithfidh gach ceist a bheith cur isteach tríd an fhoirm fiosraithe ar líne a úsáid, tríd an teileafón nó i scríbhinn
You can email the Blind Pension section using the secure enquiry form
Is féidir leat ríomhphost don Rannóg Pinsean na nDall a sheoladh tríd an fhoirm fhiosraithe daingnithe a úsáid
